body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Hotel Haven support. My name is Jonathan Patterson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi! My name is Theresa Reed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Theresa. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a question about the checkout process.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, Theresa. Could you please provide me with your room number and the date of your check-in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My room number is two zero five and I checked in on the seventeenth of December.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information. Now, can you confirm the last four digits of the credit card you used for booking, and your email address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The last four digits of my credit card are eight seven six five, and my email address is theresa.reed@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the details, Theresa. I will now check the system for you. Is there anything else you would like to add before I proceed?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thanks for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Theresa. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
